meanings.definition: A cloth worn on the head for protection or decoration.
meanings.sent1: She tied the colorful headcloths around her head to shield herself from the sun.
meanings.sent2: The traditional dancers wore vibrant headcloths during the performance.
meanings.sent3: The headcloths looked like a rainbow on her head, making everyone smile.
meanings.sent4: Her headcloths were like a crown, adding a regal touch to her outfit.
meanings.sent5: The soft fabric of the headcloths felt like a gentle hug on her head.

meanings.definition: Cloths used to cover the head.
meanings.sent1: He packed his headcloths for the camping trip to keep warm at night.
meanings.sent2: The headcloths protected her hair from the wind as she rode on the motorcycle.
meanings.sent3: The headcloths flew off in the wind, causing a comical chase around the park.
meanings.sent4: The headcloths were a shield against the harsh reality of the world outside.
meanings.sent5: The bright colors of the headcloths made her easy to spot in the crowd.
